content.string:
It's Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop's 6th birthday on Steam! Later today, there will be a big update with lots of changes and new content, but before we get to that, we're trying something new.
This week, any mission you complete will award twice as many experience points. Mathematically, there's never been a better time to unlock your arsenal or work towards that next promotion.
The double experience week will start at midnight UTC on April 20, 2023 and run for 8 days.
Earn double experience from missions during Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop's 6th anniversary celebration!
It's Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop's 6th birthday on Steam! Earn double experience toward unlocking weapons or promotions from missions all week long.
Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop - Double Experience Week
